biography: Here is a brief biography of Matti, a golfer whose competitive spirit and dedication have left a mark on the Hector Trophée, even though he is considered to be retired from Hector events.
Matti has participated twice in the Hector Trophée. Although success in the form of a tournament win has eluded him, Matti's presence has always been felt.

Known for his quiet demeanor off the course, Matti transforms into a fierce competitor once the game begins. His strategic mind and precise execution make him a formidable opponent in any format. While his home club remains a mystery, his commitment to the sport is evident in every swing.
While Matti will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his contributions to the tournament are appreciated, and the possibility of a future return is always open.
